title: JSON CSV Table Schema Specification
description: CSV Table Schema Specification v-0.1.x based on JSON Schema

$schema.description: The used dialect of the CSV schema. Can be used to verify that the schema is valid.

version.description: The version of the CSV schema.

title.description: The title of the CSV schema.

description.description: A short human-readable description of this CSV schema.

notes.description: Additional human-readable notes for this CSV schema.

name.description: The name of the CSV table.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV table.

type.description: Supported table types: `ordered` (columns must appear in defined order), `unordered` (columns can appear in any order) and `headless` (no header row present)

skipFirstRows.description: The number of rows to skip at the beginning of the CSV file.

skipEmptyRows.description: Specifies whether empty rows should be ignored. Empty rows are rows in which each column has an empty value.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content. Can be overriden by the language tag of a column.

additionalColumns.description: A boolean that specifies whether additional columns are allowed.

uniqueKeys.description: An array of unique key definitions.

items.description: An array of column IDs as unique key definition

name.description: The name of the CSV dictionary.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV dictionary.

skipFirstRows.description: The number of rows to skip at the beginning of the CSV file.

skipEmptyRows.description: Specifies whether empty rows should be ignored. Empty rows are rows in which each column has an empty value.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content. Can be overriden by the language tag of a key.

name.description: The name of the CSV polymorphic table.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV polymorphic table.

skipFirstRows.description: The number of rows to skip at the beginning of the CSV file.

skipEmptyRows.description: Specifies whether empty rows should be ignored. Empty rows are rows in which each column, with the exception of the discriminator column, has an empty value.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content. Can be overriden by the language tag of a column.

additionalColumns.description: A boolean that specifies whether additional columns are allowed.

tables.description: A list of different CSV tables.

name.description: The name of the embedded CSV table.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the embedded CSV table.

uniqueKeys.description: An array of unique key definitions.

items.description: An array of column IDs as unique key definition

discriminatorType.description: This is an discriminator type column.

id.description: The ID of the CSV column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column.

description.description: A short human-readable  description of the CSV column.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column.

values.description: The list of allowed values for this discriminator.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the value.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content.

stringType.description: This is a string type column or key.

id.description: The ID of the CSV column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column or key.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column or key.

minLength.description: An integer that specifies the minimum character length of the value.

maxLength.description: An integer that specifies the maximum character length of the value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

nullValues.description: List of values that represent the null state.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column or key can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content.

pattern.description: A string that specifies a regular expression that must mach against each value.

enumType.description: This is an enumeration type column or key.

id.description: The ID of the CSV column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column or key.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column or key.

members.description: The list of allowed values for this enumeration.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

nullValues.description: List of values that represent the null state.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column or key can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content.

enumSetType.description: This is an enumeration set type column or key. The set of values is formatted as csv string.

id.description: The ID of the CSV column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column or key.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column or key.

members.description: The list of allowed values for the enumeration set.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

nullValues.description: List of values that represent the null state.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column or key can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

language.description: A language tag according to https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt to specify the language of the content.

integerType.description: This is a integer type column or key.

id.description: The ID of the CSV column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column or key.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column or key.

minValue.description: An string that specifies the minimum allowed value.

maxValue.description: An string that specifies the maximum allowed value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

nullValues.description: List of values that represent the null state.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column or key can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

numericType.description: This is a numeric type column or key.

name.description: The name of the CSV column or key.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The type keyword of the CSV column or key.

formats.description: List of valid format strings according to https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.

minValue.description: An string that specifies the minimum allowed value.

exclusiveMinValue.description: An string that specifies the representing an exclusive lower limit for a value.

maxValue.description: An string that specifies the maximum allowed value.

exclusiveMaxValue.description: An string that specifies the representing an exclusive upper limit for a value.

nullable.description: A boolean that specifies whether the value can be empty.

nullValues.description: List of values that represent the null state.

optional.description: A boolean that specifies whether the column or key can be omitted. See remarks for headless tables in documentation.

description.description: A short human-readable description of the CSV column or key.

type.description: The data type of the CSV column or key.

customExtension.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.
